Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm...<sp:5:0:0> That white horse...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0001>The Hyrulean royal family once had a
beautiful pure-white horse.

I wonder if this darling is descended from
a royal horse.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>To think I'd see the legendary horse
Epona yet again...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You've brought a lot of joy to my life,
traveler. A lot of joy, indeed.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Hm! Now that's quite the horse...<sp:5:0:0> It's not
often you see such a splendid steed.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Oh my! Is that...<sp:5:0:0>a golden horse?!


What a rare sight! It's said that only one
is born every 100 years.

I never thought that I'd be fortunate
enough to see one in my lifetime.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Thank you, traveler. Meeting you has
made my days more lively.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>N-no way...<sp:5:0:0> Is that horse...<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Epona?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>


To be accompanied by such a
legendary horse...<sp:5:1:0>

I thought this ever since you brought a
skeletal horse by. But this? You must be
extraordinary indeed.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_00>Hmm. The metallic sheen is beautiful.
I wonder what causes it.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Be careful out there. That afternoon <clr:0000>heat<clr:ffff>
can be ruthless.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Ooh. This skeletal horse is remarkable.
Its appearance might be a little...unusual,
but it has the most adorable face.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting>Be careful out there. That nighttime <clr:0000>chill<clr:ffff>
can be brutal.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Greeting>Heading out? If you have any business
with the stable, they can take care of you
at the counter.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>I'll never tire of looking at this lovely,
snowy horse. So dignified. Just like
Princess Zelda.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Ease>You've caught me on my break. I need a
moment to sit down.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>It might be dark, but that's no bother
to a horse. They have sharp eyes.
Even at night.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Notice>Huh? Oh, hm. I was just resting my eyes.
It's a mite late for traveling, isn't it?
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>What wretched rain... I need to make sure
the horses don't catch a chill.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Looks like <clr:0000>lightning<clr:ffff> could strike at any
minute. The poor horses are terrified.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Truly I live in a wondrous time. Skeletal
horses are not mere stories...

And creatures I thought would never get
used to people can be tamed.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>When I think that there might be other
miracles I've yet to see, well... What a
time to be alive.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Oho. What a sweet darling you have
there! Just be careful when you dismount.
I hear they can be feisty.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Where are you heading now, traveler?<sp:0:4:0>If you're setting out toward the desert in
the <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>, then make sure to rest
here while you can.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>There used to be a stable at the entrance
to the desert, but it's long gone.<sp:0:4:0>Nowadays you'll find a <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> on
the way, but it doesn't have an inn.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>If you're setting out toward the desert in
the <clr:0000>southwest<clr:ffff>, then make sure to rest
here while you can.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>You'll find a <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> on the way,
but it doesn't have an inn.
